---
title: Pricing
---

Notte tracks your usage via credits which can be acquired through a subscription or through a direct purchase. If you are on a subscription plan, then your plan credits will refresh when your plan renews. You can purchase credits and subscribe to a plan on the [billing page](https://console.notte.cc/billing).

<Info>
**1 credit = $0.01**
</Info>


## Browser Sessions

Browser session pricing is composed of two parts: **session duration** (in minutes) and **proxy usage** (in GB). The latter is only charged for sessions started with `proxies` parameter.


<div className="overflow-x-auto">
  <table className="w-full min-w-full border-collapse border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 table-fixed">
    <thead>
      <tr className="bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800">
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Service</th>
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Credits</th>
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Cost</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 font-medium">Browser Usage</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">1 credit / min</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$0.01 / min</td>
      </tr>
      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Proxy Usage</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">1K credits / GB</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$10 / GB</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>

## Session Operations

Operations (i.e action execution) on a session are charged at the following rates:

<div className="overflow-x-auto">
  <table className="w-full min-w-full border-collapse border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 table-fixed">
    <thead>
      <tr className="bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800">
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Service</th>
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Credits</th>
        <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Cost</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 font-medium">Session Action Execution (click, fill, etc.)</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">1 credit / execution</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$0.01 / execution</td>
      </tr>
      <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 font-medium">Session Scrape</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">1 credit / scrape</td>
        <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$0.01 / scrape</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>

## AI Agents

Pricing for AI agents operates on a per-step basis.

<div className="overflow-x-auto">
  <table className="w-full min-w-full border-collapse border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 table-fixed">
  <thead>
    <tr className="bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800">
      <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Service</th>
      <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Credits</th>
      <th className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 text-left font-semibold w-1/3">Cost</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3 font-medium">Notte Agent</td>
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">2 credits</td>
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$0.02 / step</td>
    </tr>
    <tr className="hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700">
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">Notte BUA (Browser Using Agent)</td>
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">1 credits / step</td>
      <td className="border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 px-11 py-3">$0.01 / step</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
</div>

## Example

An agent running for 1 minute with 10 steps:

- 10 agent steps Ã— 2 credits = 20 credits
- 1 minute session time = 1 credit
- **Total: 21 credits = $0.21**

## Pro Plan

- 10,000 credits monthly
- Manual top-ups: 1,000 credits for $10
- Higher rate limits

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Start Free" icon="rocket" href="https://console.notte.cc">
    Get 500 free credits
  </Card>
  <Card title="Contact Sales" icon="users" href="https://www.notte.cc/demo-request">
    Enterprise plans
  </Card>
</CardGroup>{" "}
